Title: 42502 -  # Reasons You Need to Have an Ecommerce Store by 2017
Direction: 500 words. List 3-6 reasons businesses should offer their products or services online by 2017. For example, it's easy to work with ecomm apps, online orders boost revenue, and many businesses (like Taco Bell and Starbucks) already do it. Your target audience is small brick and mortar businesses that only use their sites for information. For example, hair salons can take online appointments and bakeries can take online orders. For the link, mention that customer data is more secure than ever, and with the right employee training and cloud security system, you don't have to worry about a data breach.

Title: 42507 - # Ways to Reduce Employee Liability Within a Company
Direction: 500 words. List 3-6 ways companies can reduce the risk of employees leaking sensitive information or opening the door to hackers. Examples include creating a hierarchy of people who can access privileged information, changing the passwords often, and updating employee access when their roles change (or they're fired). Employee error is one of the leading causes of data breaches, so this is an opportunity to strengthen their security internally. Link to the client's site when discussing access policies or limiting employee access, and suggest cloud security education. Your target audience is IT managers who are looking to make their company more secure from threats.

Title: 42512 - # Steps to Protecting Your Data After Terminating an Employee

Some headings could include changing passwords, restricting access to files, and recovering technology products (feel free to expand). Your audience is business owners with an interest in technology.
